Veterinary Parasitology An introduction of the parasites of Veterinary Importance Welcome

Veterinary Parasitology An introduction of the parasites of Veterinary Importance Pratap Kafle 2021-02-21 Welcome Welcome to the veterinary parasitology course You can use this book as a reference to your lectures. This is very important Figure 0.1: Dogs and cats There is a lot of information within this practical book and we do not expect you to read everything we link to. You should attend each lecture, go through every practical and do some associated reading. This is a 15 credit module, equivalent to 150 hours of study (including the taught sessions). Outside of our lectures and practical sessions (3 hours a week) you should be spending an extra 12 hours a week on this module.
